description:
When a wealthy adventurer goes missing in Alaska, his nephew hires Ryo as a bodyguard so he can stay alive long enough to ihherit his uncle`s fortune.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koi no Rival Shutsugen!? Kaori-san o Itadakimasu
Ryo`s Rival in Love?! - Give Me Kaori
恋のライバル出現!? 香さんをいただきます
